kpi.name: M5000C82

kpi_info.title: HSDPA USERS 2 IN TARGET CELL 0 IN OTHER CELL
kpi_info.use: Number of scheduled HSDPA users per TTI when there are two HSDPA users in the target cell and no HSDPA users in the other cell (2-0). Incremented for every TTI for which there is data in the HSDPA user buffers, the data (MAC-hs PDU) is scheduled to be sent to the user and the cell combination matches the counter description.

kpi.kpi_alias: HSDPA USERS 2 IN TARGET CELL 0 IN OTHER CELL
